text:
Johannah sorriu com a educação de Harry e indicou que eles deveriam subir. O homem de olhos azuis pegou a mala única que decidiram levar e subiu logo atrás de Louise.
Ela parou diante da porta que dava acesso ao quarto e abriu sem rodeios, deixando que Harry entrasse e tomasse o tempo necessário para analisar tudo.
Era um quarto azul; simples e bem limpo. O guarda-roupas era de um tom branco, muito bem conservado. Tinha uma pequena escrivaninha e o lençol da cama era do homem aranha- herói esse que ainda era o preferido de Louise. Haviam várias fotos da garota quando ainda tinha quinze anos, e também de quando era criança. Ela sabia que Harry estava analisando todas aquelas imagens, tentando fazer aquele garoto que estava retratado ter alguma ligação com a garota linda, delicada e sedutora que estava logo atrás de seu corpo.
— E então? Você vai ficar caladinho? — Ela sussurrou, puxando a atenção de Harry.
trans:
Johannah smiled at Harry's politeness and indicated they should go upstairs. The man with blue eyes grabbed the single suitcase they decided to take and went upstairs right Louise.
She stopped at the door that gave access to the room and opened it bluntly, letting Harry get in and take the necessary time to evaluate all.
It was a blue room, simple and neat. The wardrobe was white and very well maintained. It had a small desk and a Spiderman's bed sheet - the heroe who was still Louise's favourite. There were pictures of the girl when she was fifteen and also when she was a child. She knew Harry was analysing everything in those images, trying to find a connection between the boy that was being portrayed with the cute, delicate and seductive girl who was right behind his back.
— So? Will you remain silent? — She whispered, calling Harry's attention.
